attributes.additional_details: Instead of giving the country hope, the health minister keeps placing restrictions. We want him removed. A health minister should be someone who has an expertise dealing with health. Matt Hancock has an economics degree. We want a health minister who cares about mental health and has the best interests of the people. Matt Hancock’s best interest is to stay in power! Remove him!
attributes.background: Please remove Matt Hancock from parliament. He is acting in a facist way, making the UK a dictatorship. We understand that many countries are using rules to stop the spread, however we believe Hancock is incompetent. He is un-empathetic to those struggling with mental health.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
